vulnerability_findings.name: pragma
vulnerability_findings.message:
Different versions of Solidity is used in IGaugeController.sol:
	- Version used: ['0.6.11', 'ABIEncoderV2']
	- IGaugeController.sol#3 declares pragma solidity0.6.11
	- IGaugeController.sol#4 declares pragma experimentalABIEncoderV2

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in IGaugeController.sol:
	- pragma solidity0.6.11 (IGaugeController.sol#3): it allows old versions
